answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!You must look at various causes of obesity—rich diet, lack of exercise, (first two seemingly ruled out in your case) adrenal gland problems, hypothyroid state, diabetes etc.A good nutrition specialist and fitness instructor can help you get your body back on track after all the tests have been done.Too much of organic food too can cause gas in stomach, especially if you have irritable bowel syndrome. I would strongly recommend you to see a gastroenterologist (a specialist who looks after the diseases of our digestive system).Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: Im a 23 year old female who eats very healthy, mostly organics, and have been experencing alot of bloating in the stomach whenever i eat followed with stomach pain, even when I eat just a little bit. By the end of the day I feel like ive gained 5 pounds. Ive had a constant yeast infection and been to the doctor with little help, just was told some girls produce more yeast than others. I excercise 4 to 5 times a week and still cant lose the weight and i just dont know what else to do, any suggestions?
title: very frustrated and need help
